title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. K, pt. 80 - Rules and Regulations on Controlled Substances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. K, pt. 80 - Rules and Regulations on Controlled Substances

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 80.1 to 80.7)

Manufacturers, Distributors, Importers and Exporters (§ 80.10 to 80.25)

Research, Instructional Activities and Chemical Analysis (§ 80.35 to 80.39)

Institutional Dispensers (§ 80.45 to 80.52)

Prescribing and Dispensing Controlled Substances (§ 80.60 to 80.78)

Dispensing to Addicts and Habitual Users, and Treatment Programs (§ 80.84 to 80.94)

Reports and Records (§ 80.100 to 80.112)

Offenses, Violations and Enforcement (§ 80.120 to 80.125)

Toxic Vapors, Hypodermic Syringes and Needles (§ 80.130 to 80.138)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. II, subch. K, pt. 80

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 21, 338, 3300, 3305, 3307, 3308, 3309, 3321, 3351, 3352, 3381, 3701[1], [6], art. 33

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. General Provisions (§ 80.1 to 80.7)

Reports and Records (§ 80.100 to 80.112)

Offenses, Violations and Enforcement (§ 80.120 to 80.125)
